Orchid Facial Oil

Brand: Herbivore Botanicals

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Orchis Mascula Extract, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane, Tocopherol, Jasminum Sambac (Jasmine) Flower Extract

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW
Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
